QuestData.Title: The Pearlfin Situation
QuestData.Description: I've been thinking.$B$BWe are cut off from support and a long way from home.$B$BAlthough these Pearlfin jinyu mistrust our presence, they do not appear to be hostile.$B$BIf we could convince them that we are their friends, an alliance between our races could prove extremely valuable.$B$B$n, you must go speak to the jinyu around the village.$B$BConvince their leaders that we are not to be feared, and that we only wish for peace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Elder Lusshan, Pearlkeeper Fujin, Instructor Sharpfin, and Ot-Temmdo at Pearlfin Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: If we can win over the jinyu, they may allow us to stay.
QuestData.RewardText: It sounds like you made quite the good impression.$B$BWell done, $n!
